name: AutoCal
description: Create calendar events using natural language (AI-powered). Fork of LLMCal with improved reliability.

options.label: Anthropic API Key
options.description: Enter your Anthropic API key from https://console.anthropic.com/

options.label: Claude Model
options.description: Choose the AI model for processing events

options.label: Preferred Calendar
options.description: Calendar name to add events to (e.g. Day2Day, Personal, Work). Must match exactly as shown in the Calendar app.

options.label: Personal Preferences
options.description: Enter your calendar preferences (e.g., 'I work 9-5 on weekdays', 'Default meeting duration is 1 hour', 'Home timezone Amsterdam')
